chrome_sessions

Top-Level Variables
sessions: ChromeSessions
Classes
ChromeSessions

Use the chrome.sessions API to query and restore tabs and windows from a browsing session.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromeSessions sessions

Class ChromeSessions

Fields
MAX_SESSION_RESULTS: dynamic
Getters and Setters
MAX_SESSION_RESULTS: dynamic
Methods
getDevices(dynamic filter, dynamic callback): void
getRecentlyClosed(dynamic filter, dynamic callback): void
restore(String sessionId, dynamic callback): void

Fields

final dynamic MAX_SESSION_RESULTS

Getters and Setters

dynamic get MAX_SESSION_RESULTS

The maximum number of Session that will be included in a requested list.

Methods

void getDevices(dynamic filter, dynamic callback)

Retrieves all devices with synced sessions.

void getRecentlyClosed(dynamic filter, dynamic callback)

Gets the list of recently closed tabs and/or windows.

void restore(String sessionId, dynamic callback)

Reopens a windows.Window or tabs.Tab, with an optional callback to run when the entry has been restored. sessionId The windows.Window.sessionId, or tabs.Tab.sessionId to restore.
